reviews_data.review_text: Summit Eastover is one of my favorite coffee shops in Charlotte! The staff goes above and beyond in customer service and cafe quality! They are a fantastic location to work from, socialize, or simply order ahead for takeout! The parking is also super easy with the designated lot as well as plenty of street parking.

The coffee was so good that I started searching all the locations I could visit during a vacation to NC! Just delicious, no if, ands, or buts about it. Also, the big bun?! Literally sooooo tasty! I'll absolutely be back during future visits!

I recently had the pleasure of hosting my spectacular 50th birthday celebration at Summit Coffee Eastover, surrounded by my family and friends. The venue's expansive windows offered breathtaking views, creating a truly stunning atmosphere as the evening unfolded. The versatile seating options both inside and outside the shop were perfect for accommodating my large group of 50 guests. The space provided an ideal setup for a DJ, a designated area for dancing, a Photo Booth, and even room for catered BBQ meal, complete with a selection of wine and beer at counter.

The service provided by Summit Coffee was exceptional, and the owners went above and beyond to ensure everything ran smoothly. Their accommodating nature and abundance of fantastic ideas added an extra layer of magic to the event. If you are in search of the perfect venue for your next gathering, I wholeheartedly recommend considering Summit Coffee- it exceeded all of my expectations.

When I walked in and went up to the counter the barista just stared at me like she had a problem. She couldn't even speak or acknowledge me. I'm at a point where I just refuse to spend my money or tip with that kind of service. I walked right back out just as quickly as I entered. No thank you.
Great coffee, great baked goods, great atmosphere, and always friendly service. One of my go-to spots if I'm working remotely and need get my head down for an hour or two.
Good coffee.
The coffee is delicious, plus the location is beautiful. The staff at the location are the best. This location is a vibe.

Summit Coffee in Eastover has become a go-to spot for my friends and I. The ownership supports the Charlotte running community which is so important to me, and so many. The professionalism of the staff is a gold standard, come see for yourself. The ownership proudly serves our nation. Thank you for your service supporting my freedoms.

I frequent the Summit on Eastover every Tuesday for run club at 6:15am and then stay after to enjoy one of their iced coffee options. The baristas are super friendly and welcoming and take care of our large group while helping all the regulars who order pickup to go. There is plenty of seating for us to gather and hangout while we chat. I see a lot of regulars who come in for a coffee and do some work. Definitely a great place to meet a friend and hangout if you are ever interested.

Nice place, great personnel who are very friendly. Acoustics could be enhanced. It was very loud inside, hard to hear my own conversation or to order for that matter as the shop was pretty full at the time with folks all standing about chattering quite loudly.
Think of this place as a five-star Starbucks. Really really good coffee
Nice place for cup of coffee

SUPER cute place. Such friendly service . LOVE the booths... felt like I could stay as long as I needed to. Coffee is pricey but yummy. Parking is horrendous though. Having to park down the street was definitely not my fave.

This was a typical coffee shop. If you just want a nice coffee and maybe a pastry then this is your place. It's a nice atmosphere and the service was great. My tea wasn't that great but the pastry was good. Overall it was nice.
Feels like an open office, more that 60% of the tables had people with laptops, no drink on sight.  Pleasant space, good coffee.
Absolutely love Summit Eastover. Great people, energy, beverages & oh my goodness the baked goods!! Delectable, delightful, scrumptious! Also run club is Tuesday mornings at 6 :)

I'm a coffee lover, and the coffee here is amazing. I always order a latte with almond milk and it always taste really good. The place itself is very pleasant and peaceful.
Also, the croissants here are insane. I would definitely recommend this place 100%
Love this coffee spot!! Staff is so kind and everything tastes great.
Cute place to work or meet with friends
Welcoming vibes. Delicious coffee.

We love this Summit Coffee! The baristas are friendly and efficient, there is tons of seating and great lighting offered inside of the cafe, and the coffee drinks are delicious. My personal favorite is a salted caramel oat milk latte paired with a cheddar jalapeno scone!
Lovely layout and peaceful vibe. Great drink selections and I really like all of the windows and the natural light.
Outstanding! What a great place and great people!!

This new shop is beautifully put together and has a great space. The staff is super nice and the coffee was delicious and smooth. I tried the Shake it Off (Taylor's Version), but got it hot instead of iced and it was still great. Very excited for this location to be in my neighborhood!

Now one of Charlotte's best! I'll be adding this to my regular coffeehouse rotation. It has everything I want: space to not feel observed, great decor, comfortable seating, delicious matcha. I am glad this new chain opened up.

Summit Coffee Eastover has it all! The atmosphere is cozy with natural light, the pastries are fresh and delish!  And the beverages are made with kindness.  Great cafe to do paperwork or hang out with friends.  It is wheelchair accessible too. Highly recommend Summit Coffee Eastover

This location was, in a word, meh.
The parking lot was full at 3:45pm on a Wednesday. Street parking is sometimes available (pay attention to towing zone signs), but the parking situation was frustrating at best and definitely put a damper on my experience.
Once I found a place to park, I walked in to the calming, familiar teal interior of the cafe. Baristas were... not my favorite. They weren't explicitly rude, but very cold and seemed annoyed at me questioning the menu. Asked if any sweets were dairy free, barista just shrugged. That's okay--they weren't marked, I didn't expect barista to know but a verbal response would have been appreciated.
However, the biggest reason for the three stars is that NONE of the cold foam drinks can be made dairy-free. In 2023, it is ridiculous that they REFUSE to do this, even Sbux can do it for some drinks! I didn't even bother asking them to use sanitized equipment for my drink after hearing this. I got the (seasonal, I think) lavender honey latte, but did not enjoy the charge for DF milk, as other Summit locations don't have this.
All in all, the Plaza location is only 10 minutes away and far better than this one.
Lovely ambiance with friendly staff and great coffee/pastry options. Fantastic place to get work done and/or socialize with a friend. Highly recommend.

Wow! What an amazing coffee shop! The dark roast was delicious and served with a smile. The baked goods, ( brought daughters and tried everything they offered) were fresh , and flavorful .. The shortbread brought me back to my Scottish grandmother's, you can absolutely taste the love and care baked in. I can't recommend Summit Coffee enough and I'm a real foodie and coffee  snob.. Johnny Review says two thumbs up..

Great atmosphere for individuals who want a quiet place to study or work. Summit on Eastover offers great customer service and quality coffee/baked goods. They also have a sitting area outside for dogs.

The Summit on Eastover has become my new favorite coffee shop in Charlotte, NC. The staff is always friendly and the coffee never disappoints. They have free WiFi along plenty of comfy chairs and tables to work or study from. 10/10 would recommend Summit on Eastover.
Coffee is great, baristas are super knowledgeable and friendly.  They just opened, give them a try!

Coffee and food is amazing! However, the shop is very loud and almost impossible to work in due to the noise levels. If they would invest in sound dampening panels for the walls / ceilings it would really help.
Really nice atmosphere staff super friendly good coffee. Thanks summit!
